The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 14 October is 556,528 (988.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 10 October, there were 89,464 new confirmed cases (158.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 October, there were 66,274 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 35% ( 23,190 extra cases).
